definition: to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Would you ever consider sticking to a plan to do ten sit-ups a day?
sentences.chinese: 有想過堅持每天做十個仰臥起坐嗎？

sentences.english: We throw bean bags and do sit-ups.
sentences.chinese: 我們玩丟沙包而且做仰臥起坐。

sentences.english: She used to do sit-ups before sleep, but not now.
sentences.chinese: 她過去睡覺前常做仰臥起坐，但現在不做了。

sentences.english: Try push-ups, abdominal crunches and leg squats.
sentences.chinese: 試試俯臥撐，仰臥起坐和下蹲起立。

sentences.english: Which is supported by a structure too expansive for a sit-up.
sentences.chinese: 這由仰臥起坐結構支撐起來太大。
羅勃特，你練習仰臥起坐。

sentences.english: If you're bored of sit-ups, try this exercise instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果你厭煩了做仰臥起坐，試試這個練習。

sentences.english: I need to do 200 sit-ups everyday to get rid of my spare tire.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Will sit-ups help prevent me from getting a little soft around the middle?
sentences.chinese: 仰臥起坐會不會幫助我的腹部練得不再柔軟？

sentences.english: B. I think sit-ups exercise will be helpful.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲做仰臥起坐的運動較有’幫助。

sentences.english: In order to take the warts in my belly away ,I need to making 200 sit-ups everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: When you get out of bed each morning, do five sit-ups first.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上起牀時先做五個仰臥起坐。

sentences.english: I do two hundred sit-ups every day in order that reduce my tripe.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做兩百次仰臥起坐來消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: I do 300 sit-ups everyday. It's my way of relieving stress.
sentences.chinese: 我每天做三百個仰臥起坐，這是我解除壓力的方法。

sentences.english: For example to do sit-up every day can practice our waist.
sentences.chinese: 例如，每天做仰臥起坐可以鍛鍊我們的腰。

sentences.english: Some people seem to be more prone to back problems caused by sit-ups than others.
sentences.chinese: 對於有些人來說，仰臥起坐似乎更容易產生腰背問題。

definition: (Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])
to save food/to go on a diet
